tuv.seg: Lists, Tables, and the "Foreach" Function 2.1 Managing Spreadsheet-Like Data 2.2 Some Simple List Algorithms (Count, Sum, Average, Max/Min) 2.3 Searching 2.4 Gathering Data, and the "Copy" Function 2.5 List Comparison Functions 2.6 Creating Lists From User Input 2.7 Three Useful Data Storage Programs: Inventory, Contacts, Schedule 2.8 Working With Tables of Data: Columns and Rows 2.9 Additional List/Block/Series Functions and Techniques 2.10 Sorting Lists and Tables of Data 2.11 CSV Files and the "Parse" Function 2.12 Two Paypal Report Programs, Analyzed 2.13 Some Perspective about Studying These Topics 3\.
